title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Army of the James
body: Army of the James         Major General Edward O.C. Ord   Major General Edward O. C. Ord XXIV Army Corps, 1st Division XXV Army Corps, 2nd Division    Headquarters Guard 3rd Pennsylvania Heavy Artillery, Companies D and I  Engineers 1st New York Engineers  Pontoniers 3rd Massachusetts Heavy Artillery, Company I  Unattached Cavalry 4th Massachusetts, Companies I, L and M 5th Massachusetts Cavalry (Colored) 7th New York Cavalry (1st Mounted Rifles)
